testsuite.name: PostControllerSpec

testcase.name: Get a users timeline given their id
Check that non-existent users are handled with an error
Adding a valid new post to the timeline
Testing id of joe_cool redirects to /post/timeline/joe_cool
Testing id of null redirects to /post/timeline/chuck_norris

testsuite.system-out: --Output from Get a users timeline given their id-- --Output from Check that non-existent users are handled with an error-- --Output from Adding a valid new post to the timeline-- --Output from Testing id of joe_cool redirects to /post/timeline/joe_cool-- --Output from Testing id of null redirects to /post/timeline/chuck_norris--
testsuite.system-err: --Output from Get a users timeline given their id-- --Output from Check that non-existent users are handled with an error-- --Output from Adding a valid new post to the timeline-- --Output from Testing id of joe_cool redirects to /post/timeline/joe_cool-- --Output from Testing id of null redirects to /post/timeline/chuck_norris--
